ygData.subject: RE: Dual Bard Invisibility Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed this two, even more strangely I was able to weave healing and invis and still not be seen.  It could be there are some mobs which cannot see thru
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed this two, even more strangely I was able to weave healing and
invis and still not be seen. It could be there are some mobs which cannot
see thru invis that can see you when the song pulses. I was definitely able
to stand right next to a mob that would normally agro and weave invis and
healing without activating it. The mob I tested on was a gnoll reaver in
East Karana. He was blue to me and I was right in front of him, yet he
ignored me and stayed indifferent the whole time I was weaving the two
songs.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: eqreed@... [mailto:eqreed@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:35 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Dual Bard Invisibility Question


From: eqreed@...

I've read on the Bard Song Analysis page, that in a 2 bard party, you cannot
have one singing invisibility, and the other singing any other song (such as
healing, or see invis, etc.)

Quotes:

"[Ziann] With 2 bards in the group... if you get separated and both are
singing
invis you will go visible for a pulse when meeting up. Also on the same
note
you can not have 2 bards singing invis at the same time as both bards will
go
visible on the song pulses. This can be deadly when you are deep in a place
like Mistmoore Castle."

"[Kaearia] Any song will allow mobs to see you even if you are still
invisible. e.g. If one bard is singing this song, and another is singing
Hymn,
the mobs can see you."

However, my experience in a 2 bard party last night would seem to indicate
differently. We seemed to be invis, and healing at the same time.

Has anyone done any tests with this?

- Reed (E'ci)

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
